abilities.name: Force Speed
abilities.description: Each character in this unit may Dash.

abilities.name: There is No Place to Run
abilities.description: Choose an enemy character within Range 3. Pull that character Range 2 toward this character. Then this character may make a 5 dice melee attack targeting that character.

abilities.name: Sustained by Rage
abilities.description: While this unit is wounded, it has +2 dice to its melee attacks.

abilities.name: Die, Jedi, Die
abilities.description: When an enemy Primary Unit or enemy Secondary Unit is Wounded by an attack made by this unit, this unit may Heal 3 or Refresh 2 Force.
